languages.text: "Анализ рекомендует приготовить системы Простора к грядущим столкновениям с силами, доминирующими теперь на мире Райкад Минорис. Сценарий экспансивной конфронтации вероятен на 86%".
"Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."
languages.original_text: "Анализ рекомендует приготовить системы Простора к грядущим столкновениям с силами, доминирующими теперь на мире Райкад Минорис. Сценарий экспансивной конфронтации вероятен на 86%".

traits.locale_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “分析结果建议，科罗努斯各星系应做好准备，不久之后将会与控制小莱卡德的势力发生冲突。就目前的计算结果，发生大规模冲突的可能性为86%。”
languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

traits.locale_text: “分析结果建议，科罗努斯各星系应做好准备，不久之后将会与控制小莱卡德的势力发生冲突。就目前的计算结果，发生大规模冲突的可能性为86%。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les analyses recommandent de préparer les systèmes des Étendues à un affrontement imminent avec les forces qui dominent Rykad Minoris. Les probabilités d'un conflit à grande échelle sont actuellement de 86 %. »
languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

traits.locale_text: « Les analyses recommandent de préparer les systèmes des Étendues à un affrontement imminent avec les forces qui dominent Rykad Minoris. Les probabilités d'un conflit à grande échelle sont actuellement de 86 %. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El análisis recomienda que los sistemas de la Extensión se preparen para conflictos inminentes con las fuerzas que ahora controlan Rykad Minoris. La probabilidad actual de que se produzcan conflictos a gran escala es del 86 %».
languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

traits.locale_text: «El análisis recomienda que los sistemas de la Extensión se preparen para conflictos inminentes con las fuerzas que ahora controlan Rykad Minoris. La probabilidad actual de que se produzcan conflictos a gran escala es del 86 %».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「解析の結果、エクスパンスの星系は、現在ライカド・ミノリスを支配する力と間もなく衝突すると勧告されている。大規模な対立の発生確率は現時点で86％」
languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

traits.locale_text: 「解析の結果、エクスパンスの星系は、現在ライカド・ミノリスを支配する力と間もなく衝突すると勧告されている。大規模な対立の発生確率は現時点で86％」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Empfehlung nach eingehender Analyse: Die Systeme der Ausdehnung sollten sich auf unmittelbar bevorstehende Konflikte mit den Truppen einstellen, die nun Rykad Minoris dominieren. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer großen Konfrontation liegt momentan bei 86 Prozent."
languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Analysis recommends that the systems of the Expanse prepare for imminent clashes with the forces now dominating Rykad Minoris. Probability of a large-scale confrontation currently stands at 86%."

languages.text: "Analiz, Enginlik sistemlerinin şu anda Rykad Minoris'e hâkim olan güçlerle yaklaşmakta olan savaşa hazırlanmasını öneriyor. Büyük çaplı bir savaş yaşanma olasılığı şu anda %86."
